Server.Name: JoesMod
Server.Description:
JoesMod is an overhaul mod with many quality of life updates. Mainly focused on filling out alot of the gaps in the base game progression. Vanilla with sprinkles effect
For all update Information and future planned improvements please follow us in Discord at https://discordapp.com/invite/8YjcR6k And don"t forget to watch us on Twitch at https://twitch.tv/chaosmodeltheory and at https://www.twitch.tv/nichol_one
